data.title: 7TH ECNDT '98 Professional Program
data.meta_description: 7th European Conference on Non-destructive Testing (NDT) is organised in Copenhagen 26-29 May 1998
data.text:
Session 2 - Standardisation of NDT for Welds 10:40 S. Crutzen, P. Memaitre, M. Bièth, L. Fabbri - EC, The Netherlands.* Harmonisation of Inspection Techniques in the Pressure Equipment Industry. 11:00 J.-M. Tchilian - Framatome, France. NDE of Welds. European Standards Prepared by TC 121 SC5B. State of Affairs. 11:20 E. Zeelenberg - Stoomwezen, The Netherlands. Development of Acceptance Criteria for TOFD. 11:40 J. Toivonen - Polartest, Finland. NDT - Wordgames for Outsiders? Sessions: Nuclear Industry Session 1 - General Presentation

Chairman: Francis Pons, EDF, France 08:30 M. Samman, EDF, France. Main Evolutions of NDT in Nuclear Industry. 09:00 L. Kastre - ABB, Sweden. Visual Inspection Used in the Nuclear Field. - Making Use of Advances in Technology. 09:20 T. Just, W. Thale, R. Clausen - TÜV Nord, Germany. Interpretation of Radiographs by Digital Image Processing. 09:40 M. Borras, E. Cabrera, J. Aldea - TECHNATOM, Spain. Multitechnique Data Acquisition Systems: Use and Benefits in Nuclear Market. Session 2 - Steam Generator Tube Inspection

Session Leaders: Michel Bieth, EC, The Netherlands 10:40 T. Sollier, H. Schepens, B. Benoist - CEA. J. Reuchet- IPSN. France.* First Evaluation of the Set (Rotating Excitation) EC Probe Designed for Fast SG Tubing Inspection.* 11:00 M. Piriou, I. Slazak, N. Betsch - Intercontrôle, France. New Eddy Current Probe for Non Destructive Examination. 11:20 A. Debnar - CerMat Engineering. B. Lucht - KKW. Germany. Remote Field Eddy Current on Laser Welded SG Sleeves. 11:40 D. Doche, L. Gay - LOGITEST. N. Robert, A. Revest - ABB Barras. D. Delacencerie - EDF/UTO. France. Running of the BETA 1 Robot for Non-Destructive Testing on Steam Generators Tubes. Session 3 - Fuel and RPV Internals

Session Leaders: Ladislas Horacek, # 14:00 N. Kelstrup - ANDREX, Denmark. J. Patton - FRAMATOME, USA. Weld Inspection of Nuclear Fuel Rod End Cap Welds. 14:20 H.-D. Dau - Philips Industrial X-Ray, Germany. A. Kouznetsov - JSC Maschinbuilding Plant, Russia. Digital Image Processing in X-Ray Control of Welds. 14:40 T. Stepinski, P. Wu, M. Gustafsson, L. Ericsson - Uppsala Uni., Sweden. Ultrasonic Array Technique for the Inspection of Copper Lined Canisters for Nuclear Waste Fuel. 15:00 R. Kazys, R. Sliteris, L. Mazeika - Kaunas Uni. of Technology, Lithuania. Ultrasonic non-destructive Evaluation of Nuclear Fuel Bundles. Session 4 - Fuel and RPV Internals, cont.

Session Leaders: Ladislas Horacek, # 16:00 S.A. Vinogradov, A.I. Trofimov - Nuclear Power Eng. Inst. V.D. Baldin - Research and Dev. Inst. of Power Eng. V.V. Stasenko - Kursk Nuclear Power Plant. Russia. Non-Destructive Examination Automated System for RBMK Reactors Fuel Channels. 16:20 A. Domingo, J.M. Jimenez, J.I. Ortiz - ENUSA, Spain. Electromagnetic and Gamma Scanning Inspection of Nuclear Fuel Rods at ENUSA. 16:40 F. D'Annucci, F. Bonitz - ABB Reaktor, Germany. T. Yamashita - Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, Japan. Inspection of the Barrel Welds and Barrel/former Bolts in the Pressurized Reactors. 17:00 P. Cerckel, D. Degreve - Laborelec, Belgium. Virtual Instrumentation: A Revolution in Non-Destructive Testing. 17:20 J. Larsen, H. Kristensen, L. Jeppesen - FORCE Inst., Denmark. * Examination of Core Shroud Welds. Sessions: Computer Simulation Session 1 - Signal Processing

Chairman: Valeri Vengrinovich, Academy of Science, Belarus 08:30 Introduction: Chairman 08:40 L. Ericsson - TSonic. M. Gustafsson - Uppsala Uni.. Sweden. Perception and Entropy Inspired Ultrasonic Grain Noise Suppression, Using Noncoherent Detector Statistics. 09:00 R. Rosseau, D. Degreve - Laborelec, Belgium. The Ultimate NDE Expert: Real Time Comparison. 09:20 P.P. van 't Veen, J. Jarmulak - TNO Inst. of Applied Physics, The Netherlands. Automated Interpretation of Heterogeneous NDT Measurements. 09:40 T. Stepinski, L. Ericsson, M. Gustafsson - Uppsala Uni.. B. Vagnhammar - IAR Systems. Sweden. Neural Network Based Classifier for Ultrasonic Resonance Spectra. Session 2 - Tomography and Data Inversion

Session Leader: N. Harfield, University of Surrey, UK. 10:40 V. Vengrinovich, Y. Denkevich - Academy of Sciences, Belarus. G.-R. Tillack - BAM, Germany. Limited Projections and Views Bayesian 3D Reconstruction Using Gibbs Priors. 11:00 V.M. Artemiev, A.O. Naumov - Inst. of Applied Physics, Belarus. G.-R. Tillack -BAM, Germany. Fundamental of the Theory for Adaptive Image Reconstruction in X-Ray Tomography. 11:20 V.A. Mikhnev - National Academy of Sciences, Belarus. Microwave Frequency-Swept Reconstruction of Complicated Dielectric Profiles. 11:40 A. Puro, H. Aben - Inst. of Cybernetics, Estonia. Tensor Field Tomography for Residual Stress Measurement in Glass Articles. Session 3 - Computer Modelling

Session Leader: G.-R. Tillack, BAM, Germany 14:00 S. Mastorchio - EDF, France. N. Harfield - Uni. of Surrey, UK. Modelling of Eddy-Current Interaction with Cracks in the Thin-Skin Regime: Two Approaches. 14:20 R. Hannemann, R. Marklein, K.J. Langenberg - Uni. of Kassel, Germany. Numerical Modeling of Elastic Wave Propagation in Inhomogeneous Anisotropic Media. 14:40 A. Boström - Chalmers* Uni. of Technology, Sweden. UT Defect: A Model of Ultrasonic NDT of Cracks. 15:00 G. Krug - Technion, Israel Inst. of Technology*.V. Orjelik, R. Aharoni - IRT. Israel. A Novel Method for Off-Line Defect Characterization and Sizing from Standard b-Scan Data. 15:20 Discussion Session 4 - Pattern Recognition and Diagnosis

Session Leader: A. Notea, Technion, Israel 16:00 M. Faur - CEA. P. Morisseau - Intercontrôle. L. Paradis - CEA. France. Ultrasonic Data Inversion for Outer Surface Defects Characterization. 16:20 S. Darbane, R. Drai - Scientific Research Centre in Welding and NDT CSC, Algeria. Weld Defects Recognition Using the DHT. 16:40 E. Nesvijski, T. Nesvijski - Federal Uni. of Santa Maria, Brazil. Modelling for Fatigue and Fracture Prediction of Brittle and Elasto-Plastic Materials Using Acoustic Emission Techniques. 17:00 B.P. Strelkov - RDIPEA. I. Arzhaev - ENES. A.Kh. Vopilkin a.o. - Echo. Russia. S.E. Bougaenko a.o. - RINSC MAE. Russia.* New Flaw Visualization NDE Tools as a Basis for Modern Strength Maintenance. 17:20 S.A. Nielsen, J.T. Rheinländer, K.K. Borum, H.E. Gundtoft - Risø National Laboratory, Denmark. Three-Dimensional Ultrasonic Reflection Tomography of Cylindrical Shaped Specimens. Sessions: Radiography Session 3

Chairman: Gösta Nyström, ABB TRC, Sweden 14:00 Introduction: Chairman 14:10 N. Filishov, O. Borisov, W. Isaev - Introscopy, Russia. X-Ray Introscope of Higher Sensitivity for Express-Control of Quality. 14:30 M. H.H. van Dijk, H.G.M. Martens - Eldim, The Netherlands. Radiographic Inspection of Drilled Cooling Holes. 14:50 C. Jacobsen, U. Zscherpel, C. Nockemann - BAM. G. Brast - Preussen Elektra Hannover. Germany. Crack Detection in Digitized Radiographs with Neuronal Methods. 15:10 U. Ewert, Y. Onel, U. Zscherpel, J. Stade - BAM, Germany. P. Willems - Agfa Gevaert, Belgium. Industrial Application of Computed Radiography with Luminescence Imaging Plates.
